model.name: tarfile
model.title: Tar File
model.description: Represents the TAR file XML org.apache.camel.spi.DataFormat.
model.label: dataformat,transformation,file

usingIterator.description: If the tar file has more then one entry the setting this option to true allows to work with the splitter EIP to split the data using an iterator in a streaming mode.

id.description: Sets the value of the id property.
